message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.SD. 

This paper is about improving the noise robustness of automatic speech recognition systems, which is a common problem in the field of computational linguistics (CL). Therefore, cs.CL is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves training strategies and optimization techniques, which are related to machine learning (LG) and signal processing (SI). Additionally, the paper evaluates the proposed methods on a specific dataset, which falls under the sub-category of speech recognition (SD). Finally, the paper does not involve any specific hardware or system architecture, ruling out cs.AR and cs.OS as likely sub-categories.
